Primary Contact: Sharon Hulston, Program Coordinator; Email: cwwa@coess.ca
Primary Executive: Karen Mason, Executive Director; Email: karen.mason@kelownawomensshelter.ca
Service Details: - Supports children and youth between three and 18 years of age who may have been impacted by family conflict, change or abuse- Offers free family support, information and skill development opportunities, in group or individual sessions- Children learn that they have the right to be safe, are not alone or responsible for the problems or change happening in the family; learn to identify and express feelings, healthy and appropriate forms of communication, coping strategies, and problem solving techniques
Dates: - Our programs are ongoing throughout the year- Please call for further information
